name: Agrowise
short_description:
Agrowise is targeting to be a platform for various solutions to agricultural issues and needs of farmers.
It will help them stay on track, avoid troubles, and receive all the latest information, government schemes and strategies related to the field of agriculture.

Following categories of solutions are targeted:
1) Information: Information on every aspect of farming like crop cycles, supplies, weather.
2) Advise: Based on the profile, various advises related to weather changes, investment strategies, schedule will be given.
3) Reports: Various reports appropriate to the farmer will be provided.

Farmers will interact with the system using smart phones or computers. Backend system will cater all the client devices.
summary: agricultural management solution for individual farmers
